duties_responsibilities.duty: Support engineering aspects of production for lighting, furniture, packaging, and regulatory.
Manage NPI projects and collaborate with internal teams, suppliers, and regulatory testing agencies.
Create Solidworks assemblies and 2D/3D spec packages.
Prepare, submit, and track regulatory approval of new product lines.
Provide production support and guidance, and utilize PLM/ERP for REV control.
Develop detailed Solidworks assemblies with 2D/3D spec packages.
Support sales, customer service, purchasing, and production in all aspects of product knowledge.

education_certification.credential: Electrical Engineering (BSEE) or Mechanical Engineering (BSME) degree preferred
